title: Benign methylformamidinium byproduct induced by cation heterogeneity inhibits local formation of δ-phase perovskites
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03058C, Paper
Jihoo Lim, Jaehui Kim, Josh Davies-Jones, Mohsen Danaie, Eunyoung Choi, Hongjae Shim, Liang Chen, Jincheol Kim, Judy S. Kim, Philip R. Davies, Jan Seidel, Martin A. Green, Samuel D. Stranks, Sang Il Seok, Jae Sung Yun
Methylammonium chloride (MACl) selectively promotes the formation of N-methylformamidinium (MFA+)PbI3 at grain boundaries (GBs) and as clusters near GBs while suppress the formation of δ-FAPbI3.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
